summary:
Inspiring Senior Manager with extensive experience, broad network in Pharma & Healthcare ( Oncology >20 yrs expertise) Hands on mentality for Market Access, Marketing & Sales Issues .Very successful track record & Launch excellence ( >7 brands  in last 5 years) 
 
Committed, Can do attitude, Pragmatic, Strive for continues improvement and result oriented.
Cross functional collaboration , initiate projects & programm's for fast execution 
Easily connects with customers at all levels 
Patiënt Engagement - customer orientation- co- creation
